name: Black & White
notes: Game is set to start windowed mode and a a resolution at 1024x768.

files.patch: N/A:Download Patch v1.2 or Patch v1.3 from https://www.bwfiles.com/files/category.php?id=24

content:
exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Lionhead Studios Ltd/Black & White/runblack.exe
files:
- patch: N/A:Download Patch v1.2 or Patch v1.3 from https://www.bwfiles.com/files/category.php?id=24
game:
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: data1.cab
- task:
    executable: $DISC/setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    executable: patch
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: 1024x768
